name: Kindergarten
description: The program guides children while they are figuring out how to be a student, friend, and member of a school community. The programming focuses on how to learn, helping a child create confidence while building their toolbox with foundational skills and habits that they’ll use for years to come.

howToGetIt: Tours are a required step of our application process and a great way to learn more about our school. To schedule a tour, visit Online RESERVATION or Contact staff at admissions@cds-sf.org. Application process requires prior approval before using ONLINE LINK
cost: This is a fee based service
